reviewText: Great info; Can you get more??

The DVD was interesting in its information about battles in Bible times. I did not entirely agree with some of the comments like IF there is a God. But it did shoe how weapons of wa developed. I would recommend it.

Most of what is said is correct but the author pulls away at the parting of the sea stating it was a natural accurance and not God that divided the waters. Always take with a grain of salt what the history channel has to say.
